title: Login Window (com.apple.loginwindow)
description: The payload that configures Login Window behavior.

AdminHostInfo.title: Show additional information in the menu bar
AdminHostInfo.description: The admin host info. If present in the payload, the system displays its value in the Login Window as additional computer information. Before macOS 10.10, this string could only contain host name, system version, or IP address. After macOS 10.10, setting this key to any value allows the user to click the time area of the menu bar to toggle through various computer information values.

LoginwindowText.title: Banner
LoginwindowText.description: The text to display in the Login Window.

SHOWFULLNAME.title: Display login window as
SHOWFULLNAME.description: If 'true', the system shows the name and password dialog. If 'false', the system displays a list of users.

HideLocalUsers.title: Show local users
HideLocalUsers.description: If 'true', the system shows only network and system users when showing a user list.

HideMobileAccounts.title: Show mobile accounts
HideMobileAccounts.description: If 'true', the system hides mobile account users in a user list. In some cases, mobile users show up as network users.

IncludeNetworkUser.title: Show network users
IncludeNetworkUser.description: If 'true', the system shows network users when showing a user list.

HideAdminUsers.title: Show Mac computer's administrator accounts
HideAdminUsers.description: If 'true', the system hides administrator users when showing a user list.

SHOWOTHERUSERS_MANAGED.title: Show "Other"
SHOWOTHERUSERS_MANAGED.description: If 'true', the system displays "Other..." when it shows a list of users.

SleepDisabled.title: Show the Sleep button
SleepDisabled.description: If 'true', the system disables the Sleep button.

RestartDisabled.title: Show the Restart button
RestartDisabled.description: If 'true', the system disables the Restart item.

ShutDownDisabled.title: Show the Shut Down button
ShutDownDisabled.description: If 'true', the system disables the Shut Down button.

RestartDisabledWhileLoggedIn.title: Disable the Restart menu item while logged in
RestartDisabledWhileLoggedIn.description: If 'true', the system disables the Restart menu item when the user is logged in.

ShutDownDisabledWhileLoggedIn.title: Disable the Shut Down menu item while logged in
ShutDownDisabledWhileLoggedIn.description: If 'true', the system disables the Shut Down menu item when the user is logged in.

PowerOffDisabledWhileLoggedIn.title: Disable the Power Off menu item while logged in
PowerOffDisabledWhileLoggedIn.description: If 'true', the system disables the Power Off menu item when the user is logged in.

LogOutDisabledWhileLoggedIn.title: Disable the Log Out menu item while logged in
LogOutDisabledWhileLoggedIn.description: If 'true', the system disables the Log Out menu item when the user is logged in. Available in macOS 10.13 and later.

DisableScreenLockImmediate.title: Disable the immediate Screen Lock function
DisableScreenLockImmediate.description: If 'true', the system disables the immediate Screen Lock functions. Available in macOS 10.13 and later.

com.apple.login.mcx.DisableAutoLoginClie.title: Disable automatic login if FileVault is disabled
com.apple.login.mcx.DisableAutoLoginClie.description: A loginwindow password will be required to login.

AutologinUsername.description: The user short name for an existing user to set up auto login.

AutologinPassword.description: An optional user password to set up auto login. This must match the 'AutologinUsername' user's current password.

DisableFDEAutoLogin.title: Disable automatic login if FileVault is enabled
DisableFDEAutoLogin.description: If 'true', the system disables the automatic login option when using FileVault.

DisableConsoleAccess.title: Enable >console login
DisableConsoleAccess.description: If 'true', the system disregards the '>console' special user name, which provides a command line UI.

EnableExternalAccounts.title: Enable external accounts
EnableExternalAccounts.description: Allows external accounts to log in.

AdminMayDisableMCX.title: Mac computer administrators may refresh content or disable management
AdminMayDisableMCX.description: Allows Mac administrators on the computer to refresh or disable the management features.

TALLogoutSavesState.title: Reopen windows when logging back in
TALLogoutSavesState.description: Reopens windows that were open at time of logout

UseComputerNameForComputerRecordName.title: Set Mac computer name to computer record name
UseComputerNameForComputerRecordName.description: Forces the name of the Mac to be set as the computer record name.

AllowList.title: Allowed Users or Groups
AllowList.description: The list of user GUIDs or group GUIDs of users that the system allows to log in. An asterisk ('*') string specifies all users or groups. This only applies to network accounts and mobile accounts.

DenyList.title: Denied Users or Groups
DenyList.description: The list of user GUIDs or group GUIDs of users that the system disallows to log in. This list takes priority over the list in the 'AllowList' key. This only applies to network accounts and mobile accounts.

LocalUserLoginEnabled.title: Local-only users may log in
LocalUserLoginEnabled.description: Permit only local users to log in. Network users won't be allowed to log in.

LocalUsersHaveWorkgroups.title: Local-only users use available workgroup settings
LocalUsersHaveWorkgroups.description: Local users are forced to use any available workgroup settings.

FlattenUserWorkgroups.title: Ignore workgroup nesting
FlattenUserWorkgroups.description: If users are part of a nested workgroup, only the settings of the user's workgroup are enforced.

CombineUserWorkgroups.title: Combine available workgroup settings
CombineUserWorkgroups.description: If users are part of a nested workgroup, all nested workgroup settings are enforced.

AlwaysShowWorkgroupDialog.title: Always show workgroup dialog during log in
AlwaysShowWorkgroupDialog.description: If the workgroup has a specific dialog, that dialog is shown when users log in.

ChangePasswordDisabled.title: Allow user to change password
ChangePasswordDisabled.description: Enable or disable the "Change Passwordâ€¦" button in the Users & Groups preference pane.

RetriesUntilHint.title: Show password hints after failed attempts
RetriesUntilHint.description: Number of tries until password hint is shown (0 = disable password hints).

showInputMenu.title: Show input menu in login window
showInputMenu.description: If 'true', the system shows the Input Menu in the Login Window.

HiddenUsersList.title: Hidden Users List
HiddenUsersList.description: Hides users defined in the list from the login window under the Other button
